messages.subject: Re: aizu pics
messages.msgSnippet: what is great about this book is that it has different kinds of maps to use as well... note the gun battle in this scene...in the biography of Yamakawa/Oyama
messages.messageBody:
what is great about this book is that it has different kinds of maps
to use as well...
note the gun battle in this scene...in the biography of
Yamakawa/Oyama Sutematsu there is mention of girls being in charge
of carrying cartridges from the inside of the castle to the soldiers
